thread.title: Butler Named To Preseason All-ACC Team
thread.title_full: Butler Named To Preseason All-ACC Team

author: @CalSB
title: Butler Named To Preseason All-ACC Team
text: Kelley Cox/klcfotos Butler named to preseason All-ACC team SB1/23/2025 12:01 PM | By: Cal Athletics Butler Named To Preseason All-ACC Team Cal Picked To Finish Sixth in Preseason Coaches Poll California infielder Elon Butler was named to the 2025 ACC Softball Preseason All-ACC Team, the conference office announced Thursday afternoon. Butler returns for her third season in a Golden Bear uniform after a stellar sophomore campaign, in which she was named a NFCA All-American (second team) in addition to earning spots on the NFCA All-Region First Team and All-Pac-12 Second Team. She led the team in home runs (17), RBIs (44), total bases (117) and slugging percentage (.760) while being third in runs (37), hits (54) and batting average (.351) in 2024. Cal, which will play its inaugural season as a member of the ACC, was picked to finish sixth in the league by the conference's coaches, earning 130 points in the preseason poll. Duke was the favorite with 193 points and 11 first-place votes, followed by Florida State with 183 points and four first-place votes. Virginia Tech (165), Stanford (143) and Virginia (140) rounded out the top five. Five ACC teams were ranked in ESPN.com/USA Softball Preseason Top 25, tied for the second-most of all conferences. Duke led the conference at No. 8, followed by Florida State (No. 12), Virginia Tech (No. 18), Cal (No. 21) and Stanford (No. 22). 2025 ACC Softball Preseason Coaches Poll 1. Duke - 193 points (11 first-place votes) 2. Florida State - 183 points (4 first-place votes) 3. Virginia Tech - 165 points 4. Stanford - 143 points 5. Virginia - 140 points 6. Cal - 130 points 7. Clemson - 126 points 8. Georgia Tech - 87 points 9. North Carolina - 85 points 10. Louisville - 73 points 11. Notre Dame - 72 points 12. Boston College - 66 points 13. NC State - 65 points 14. Syracuse - 31 points 15. Pitt - 16 points 2025 Softball Preseason All-ACC Team Elon Butler, California, INF Maddie Moore, Clemson, INF Aminah Vega, Duke, INF Jaysoni Beachum, Florida State, INF Jade Hylton, Virginia, INF D'auna Jennings, Duke, OF Jahni Kerr, Florida State, OF Alex Coleman, North Carolina, OF Emily Jones, Stanford, OF Cassidy Curd, Duke, P Eden Bigham, Virginia, P Emma Lemley, Virginia Tech, P Michaela Edenfield, Florida State, C Cori McMillan, Virginia Tech, DP/UTIL STAY POSTED For complete coverage of Cal softball, please follow the Bears on X/Twitter (CalSB), Instagram (CalSB) and Facebook (Facebook.com/CalSoftball).
